name: Sean Boutros

primary: Women ages 30–65 seeking natural breast augmentation
Women with breast implants experiencing complications like BII or capsular contracture
Post-mastectomy patients seeking autologous breast reconstruction

brand_mission: Dr. Sean Boutros provides women with safe, natural alternatives to breast implants using advanced flap-based techniques that restore confidence, function, and aesthetic harmony through their own tissue.
slogan: Your Body. Your Tissue. Your Confidence.
tagline: Natural breast augmentation and reconstruction without implants.

do: Use terms like 'your own tissue', 'living tissue', and 'no foreign material'
Highlight flap-based techniques like DIEP, PAP, and GAP
Reinforce safety, longevity, and aesthetic outcomes
donot: Overemphasize fat grafting as equivalent to DIEP
Use generic phrases like 'cosmetic surgery' without specifying natural techniques
Mention competitor brand names or implant brands

clinical_strengths: Board-certified plastic surgeon with 3,000+ DIEP and flap cases
Pioneer of All Me Augmentation™—a cosmetic DIEP flap technique
Published outcomes with 99.9% tissue success rate
Performs total capsulectomy with immediate natural restoration
Microsurgical expertise with muscle- and rib-sparing methods
philosophical_strengths: Belief in restoring confidence without synthetic materials
Prioritizes both aesthetic and health outcomes
Committed to education, transparency, and long-term patient satisfaction
organizational_strengths: Specialized DIEP flap surgical center in Houston
Efficient pre- and post-op recovery pathways
Streamlined consult process for local and out-of-state patients
Part of the broader My Houston Surgeons network

topic_targeting: Tailor content to women exploring alternatives to implants, or those seeking resolution for complications; focus on procedures like DIEP flap, fat transfer, and implant removal with natural restoration.
procedure_language: Use 'cosmetic DIEP flap breast augmentation' and 'natural breast augmentation'
Describe techniques in patient-friendly language with optional technical detail as needed
Avoid clinical jargon unless used for educational value
services: Flap-Based Breast Reconstruction (PAP, GAP, Stacked DIEP)

content_preferences.tone: Empathetic yet authoritative with a clear, educational focus
content_preferences.length: 800–1,200 words for blogs; 500–800 for landing pages
content_preferences.other_preferences: Support implant-free education, clarify differences between DIEP and fat transfer, use localized SEO

seo_focus: DIEP flap breast augmentation cosmetic surgery
